content: from knitty com *i fell in love with estonian lace for its beautiful undulating forms the curving lines and blossoms of this shawl coupled with the spectacular green of the fleece artist yarn also suggest the waving fronds and floats of an undersea kelp forest *this pattern will challenge you with uniquely estonian stitches also stitch markers are tricky to place in these pattern stitches so being able to read your knitting is a must but wrong side row are straightforward purling to let you catch your breath so jump on in the water is fine * **size** shoulderette shawl **finished measurements** - length at center back 23 38 inches - width 50 82 inches shoulderette is knit on size 4 needles with misti alpaca lace shawl is knit on size 5 needles with fleece artist suri blue for untested written directions see this post 1 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/chart-haters-anonymous/663444/1-25#5
